one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing mountain/☶/ancient Chinese compass point: 45° (northeast)

definition: Central Bank of the Republic of China (Taiwan)

sentences.english: The distribution of mineral resources and the main production corporation of silver in the world are briefly introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文扼要地介紹了銀的資源狀況及主要生產廠家。

sentences.english: Those of you who are weak will be merged.
sentences.chinese: 你們當中財務較弱的銀行將會被合併。

sentences.english: Silver azide does not dissolve in water or in nitric acid.
sentences.chinese: 疊氨化銀不溶於水或硝酸。

sentences.english: On his head was a mitre of black felt decorated with silver crescents.
sentences.chinese: 頭戴黑氈法冠，冠上飾有銀的新月。
分析家預測銀行將裁員二十萬。

sentences.english: Silver and palladium face a similarly loose market.
sentences.chinese: 銀和鈀同樣面臨寬鬆的市場。

sentences.english: Different type of silver deposits is under the control of different geotectonic environments.
sentences.chinese: 不同大地構造環境控制了不同類型的銀礦牀。

sentences.english: Drain the fish cutlets , arrange them on the rack.
sentences.chinese: 取出銀鱈魚，排放燒烤架上。

sentences.english: How China's banks are welcomed in the stock market?
sentences.chinese: 爲何中國的銀圝行都受股市歡迎？

sentences.english: Itau and Unibanco release official third-quarter earnings this week.
sentences.chinese: 本週兩家銀行將正式公佈第三季度收益報告。

sentences.english: New materials such as gilded cobber and silvery threads emerged.
sentences.chinese: 例如，銀鍍金卡柏線程出現的新材料。

sentences.english: As if to be more like a pedlar , I wear a silver ring.
sentences.chinese: 似乎爲了更像一個小販，我帶着一隻銀戒指。

sentences.english: Because it is a good plating layers of titanium and therefore will never decolorization .
sentences.chinese: 因爲是鍍了好幾層鈦銀的，因此永遠也不會脫色。

sentences.english: Through the grass came a soft silvery tinkling.
sentences.chinese: 從草海中傳來了一陣微弱的銀叮鈴聲。

sentences.english: They did not use paper money or gold or silver coins , as Europeans did.
sentences.chinese: 他們沒有向歐洲人似的用紙幣或是金，銀做成的硬幣。

sentences.english: HE and Gomori, Methenamine Silver (GMS) were used for tissue staining.
sentences.chinese: 對皮膚活檢組織行HE及六胺銀染色。
